column6: The Facility has taken everything from X-23... her mother, her new family, every chance for a normal life... but now, X-23 is going to make it all stop. She's going back to the beginning, to the man whose DNA led her down this path, the man she blames for it all... Wolverine.
column8: | penciller (cover):Michael Choi | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost | colorist:Sonia Oback | letterer:Troy Peteri
